* Team Updates
** elfy set up a discussion page for QA incentives http://pad.ubuntu.com/QAIncentive
** Beta Test results: 32 bit 7 testers (3 from team)/64 bit 5 testers (4 from team), 32 bit 19 tests run/64 bit 17 tests run
** the "Network printing" section of the documentation is updated
** the "Scanning" section of the documentation is updated
** xubuntu-default-settings discussed with team, agreed upon (and not changing any further)
** marketing team created a Donations page for folks who want to know how to finacially support Xubuntu http://xubuntu.org/donations/
** ubiquity-slideshow-ubuntu was updated for 14.10
** recent uploads: xubuntu-artwork, xubuntu-default-settings, xubuntu-docs, catfish, menulibre, light-locker-settings
** Core Testing - that's worked out nicely and we've had more reports for that than beta 1
** 14.10 installations on virtual machines are still broken, QA team looks into it
** Team to test beta regardless of lightdm issue - it can be booted to desktop afterwards - workaround is on the mailing list
** lightdm bug only appears to be affecting vm's
** b2 tests - hardware entire and auto-resize are priority if possible
* Released <nowiki>[[http://xubuntu.org/news/xubuntu-14-10-beta-2-is-released/|14.10 Beta 2]]</nowiki>
